WI+RE

Quick and practical research and writing tutorials, collaboratively designed by students at UCLA.

Workshops

Gain a solid foundation in academic research and writing and earn a certificate for each workshop you complete!

Tutorials

Get right to it with tutorials on starting your research, finding and citing sources, writing literature reviews and more.

Handouts

Prefer to work on paper? No problem - we make printable handouts, too.

Hi! We're WI+RE.

WI+RE is a learner-led community focused on helping everyone succeed in their writing and research projects.

Meet the Creative Team »
Visit WI+RE's Sandbox »
Our Design Tools and Process »

We share!

As strong believers in open educational resources, all of our work is open source, and our tips can be shared, re-used, and re-mixed under creative commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike license.

Want to collaborate? We would too! Check out our code repository and let us know your ideas!
